mapper.sql: id, count_date, type, register_num, channel, server_id, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, c9, c10, c11, c12, c13, c14, c15, c16, c17, c18, c19, c20, c21, c22, c23, c24, c25, c26, c27, c28, c29, c30, create_time
mapper.insert:
INSERT into `game_stat_ongoing` (count_date, `type`, register_num, channel, server_id, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, c9, c10, c11, c12, c13, c14, c15, c16, c17, c18, c19, c20, c21, c22, c23, c24, c25, c26, c27, c28, c29, c30, create_time) values
(#{item.countDate}, #{item.type}, #{item.registerNum}, #{item.channel}, #{item.serverId}, #{item.c1}, #{item.c2}, #{item.c3}, #{item.c4}, #{item.c5}, #{item.c6}, #{item.c7}, #{item.c8}, #{item.c9}, #{item.c10}, #{item.c11}, #{item.c12}, #{item.c13}, #{item.c14}, #{item.c15}, #{item.c16}, #{item.c17}, #{item.c18}, #{item.c19}, #{item.c20}, #{item.c21}, #{item.c22}, #{item.c23}, #{item.c24}, #{item.c25}, #{item.c26}, #{item.c27}, #{item.c28}, #{item.c29}, #{item.c30}, now())
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE register_num = values(register_num), c1 = values(c1), c2 = values(c2), c3 = values(c3), c4 = values(c4), c5 = values(c5), c6 = values(c6), c7 = values(c7), c8 = values(c8), c9 = values(c9), c10 = values(c10), c11 = values(c11), c12 = values(c12), c13 = values(c13), c14 = values(c14), c15 = values(c15), c16 = values(c16), c17 = values(c17), c18 = values(c18), c19 = values(c19), c20 = values(c20), c21 = values(c21), c22 = values(c22), c23 = values(c23), c24 = values(c24), c25 = values(c25), c26 = values(c26), c27 = values(c27), c28 = values(c28), c29 = values(c29), c30 = values(c30)
